about_the_game:
Slaughter Me Street: 1999 DEMO

You've awoken in a familiar place. You are being hunted for your misdeeds. With blood on your hands and weight on your conscience, you must collect the relics of your past, and confront your demons once and for all...

...or die trying.

Welcome back to Slaughter Me Street.

In this official spin-off to the 123 Slaughter Me Street series, you are tasked with collecting the Relics that have been randomly dispersed throughout the world, while avoiding the terrors that hunt you down. Your only solace is your trusty flashlight, and the scarce safe zones. Can you survive?

Features

  • Classic First-Person Horror gameplay with a focus on speed, exploration, and reaction time.
  • 2 separate game modes: Normal Mode and Challenge Mode, each featuring their own levels.
  • 5 unique enemies with unique behaviors and traits from one another, all ready to tear you apart.
  • A reimagined rendition of the House from 123 Slaughter Me Street 2, featuring new locations and decor.
  • 5 challenging difficulties to really push you to your absolute limits.
  • 4 Challenge levels to unlock, adding new and terrifying ways to suffer.
  • Unique and gory kills inspired by classic 80's slasher films, leaving persistent pools of blood where you died.
  • A completely original soundtrack for you to die over and over to.

With many more surprises to be found lurking in the full release.

content_descriptors.notes: Over the top cheesy 80's jumpscares that pack a bloody punch.

name: Slaughter Me Street: 1999 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 3770k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
